content.rendered:
Panaya Dreamforce Admin & Dev Recap
December 2019


Dreamforce 19 Admin and Dev Recap
Join us as 3 Salesforce MVP‘s, Eric Dreshfield, Mike Martin, and Meighan Brodkey, bring Dreamforce ‘19 to you. Our Dreamforce19 recap panel will answer the questions you want to know about the best admin/dev sessions, favorite tips and takeaways and more.

The Presenters



Meighan Brodkey

Meighan is a technical architect and the leader of the Seattle Women in Tech User Group leader. With over 450 Trailhead badges, Meighan is continuously working on increasing her Salesforce knowledge and helping others do so as well. She has spoken around the world about Salesforce.  She gives back to the community via Events, Twitter, the Trailblazer Community, OhanaSlack, her User Group and her blog.

Meighan’s LinkedIn



Eric Dreshfield

Blogger, Marketer, Community Advocate. Working in the Salesforce ecosystem since 2009, with experience in across multiple industries including transportation, retail, life sciences and more. Able to bridge the gap between technology and the people who rely on it. 

Eric’s LinkedIn



Mike Martin

Versatile Salesforce.com professional and consultative engineer with experience in sales, marketing, support, and professional services process consulting, software sales, sales support, client presentations and software demonstrations, CRM administration and development (Salesforce.com), SaaS configuration utilizing SQL, and technical support and troubleshooting; Strong background in quality and process improvement.

Mike’s LinkedIn

Resources


Webinar Recording



View Webinar

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce Highlights from MVPs
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce MVPs, AI enthusiasts, futurists, and sceptics uncover what’s next for Salesforce across Sales, Service, Marketing, and IT. Featuring Leyna Hoffer, Shivanath Devinarayanan, Meighan Brodkey, Mohith Shrivastava, Rakesh Gupta, Jean Michel Mougeolle, Amit Chaudhary, Jan Vandevelde, Atul Gupta, Fabrice Cathala, Eric Dreshfield.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Meet the MVPs
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Get acquainted with 5 amazing Salesforce MVPs who will share their secrets to success

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce 2017
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Dreamforce 2017 presentation, What happens when an Admin, an “Admineloper” and a Salesforce Developer discuss what really matters to them? 3 devoted Salesforce pros share experiences & offer tips to devs that would take months (or years) to learn. Learn common misunderstandings btw Admins & Developers, gotchas & more

jetpack-related-posts.title: Decoding Developers: Level Up Your Admin Career
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: What happens when an Admin, an “Admineloper” and a Salesforce Developer discuss what really matters to them? Well, last year the 3 Amigas, Meighan Brodkey, Leslie Gestautas, and Jean Velonis had the idea to share their stories with others in the session Level Up Your Admin Career, Secrets from Developers.…

jetpack-related-posts.title: YeurDreamin 19: Build Your Own Lightning Community in a Flash
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Presentation in June 2019 at the first ever YeurDreamin in Amsterdam on Communities with hands on session to build a lightning community with templates. Access abstract, session deck, supporting resources and more here.

img.alt_text: Build Your Own Lightning Community in a Flash

jetpack-related-posts.title: Forcelandia 19: How Flow Can Help You Become a Developer
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Using Flow to Become a Developer ForcelandiaAugust 31-September 1, 2019 About Forcelandia A pleasant mix of APIs and IPAs, Forcelandia treats you to excellent topics on the Salesforce platform’s programmatic side.
